Returns: time to first fix in milliseconds
getTimeToFirstFix().Description: Returns the time required to receive the first fix since the most recent restart of the GPS engine.
getTimeToFirstFix().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

getSatellites().Description: Returns an array of @B_android#location#GpsSatellite_E@ objects, which represent the current state of the GPS engine.
getSatellites().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

getMaxSatellites().Description: Returns the maximum number of satellites that can be in the satellite list that can be returned by @B_android#location#GpsStatus#getSatellites_E@.
getMaxSatellites().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 24

ClassDesc: use @B_android#location#GnssStatus_E@ and @B_android#location#GnssStatus#Callback_E@. This class represents the current state of the GPS engine. This class is used in conjunction with the @B_android#location#GpsStatus#Listener_E@ interface.
